data.message:
Hi
Facebook
I hope you are fine with all your good team

Please help me
How I can verify my facebook account? ???

replies.message: Hey Jahan. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: https://www.facebook.com/help/100168986860974. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: https://www.facebook.com/help/contact/356341591197702. -Jordan

Thank you

All of your team
Facebook

Actually I want to verify my facebook account
Not page
